segments.text: Can you tell me the best way to see the city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I advise the sightseeing buses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Travel by the buses ? That sounds interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes of course.You can see the whole city on the bus . It's cheap as well as efficient .
segments.speaker: S2
